comment.author: 39967544@N00
comment._content: This is in fact the Burns Philp steamer Makambo, built in 1907 to maintain links between the Australian East Coast and New Guinea and the Pacific Islands. It was sold to Japan in 1940 and torpedoed in 1944.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content:
thanks FredBom - I've updated the title to reflect this.
Georgia, Registration
